about_the_game:
Welcome to the test complex, fitted with a state-of-the-art system of redistribution of active forces.
Your participation in this test is crucial.
Use your brain and be ready to blow your mind!



ITRP _ Volatile Vertex is a small free spatial puzzle platformer about changing gravity.
You are inside a huge cubic room filled with different buildings.
On one side of it you see a large gate leading to freedom.
You need to find a way to get to them, open them and get out through them.



In some places there are devices in the form of small black and blue cubes that allow you to change gravity in a certain direction and move through buildings at a different angle.
Thanks to them, you can get to the most inaccessible places of the entire location.

Features:

  • A large, hand-crafted location, where you will have to look at the same buildings from different angles to understand how they can be used.
  • Puzzle through careful study of space. The game is not meant to test your dexterity. It is designed to test your attentiveness and spatial thinking.
  • Fall from any height. You will remain safe and unharmed.
  • Easy route planning, because all the contents of the location are almost always in sight. And you can study the walls and ceiling until they become your floor.
  • Move different platforms from one place to another to secure access to new places.
  • Find and collect keys that will help you expand your abilities.
  • Each side of a huge cubic room is individual. Ranging from appearance and soundtrack to content.

short_description: If you see a ledge, it means that it is needed for something. A three-dimensional puzzle platformer about the change of gravity in three axes. Walk on the walls and hang from the ceiling. Do whatever you want. The main thing is to get out of here.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Spanish - Spain, German, Ukrainian
